question: Identify the floral formula of plant belonging to potato family.
explanation: The floral formula for Solanaceae (Potato family) is Actinomorphic, Bisexual, Calyx (5) fused, Corolla (5) fused, Androecium 5 epipetalous, Gynoecium (2) superior, syncarpous. The option B generally represents this structure (with epipetalous arc).
